Combat Inspiration

Inspire an ally to add a +ld6 bonus to their next Attack Roll, Ability Check. Saving Throw, weapon damage, or Armour Class.

At Bard Level 5, the Combat Inspiration bonus increases to +1d8. At Bard Level 10, the Combat Inspiration bonus increases to +1d10.
